title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020), the Disability, Equality, Human
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Employment Equality Act 1998 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Employment Equality Act 1998 (Section 

12) (Reservation of Vocational Training Places) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited employment equality act 1998 (section 12) (reservation vocational training places) order 2023

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020), the Disability, Equality, Human
heading: 2. Dublin City University may reserve 32 places in its vocational education
text_raw:
2. Dublin City University may reserve 32 places in its vocational education 
courses leading to the degree of Bachelor of Education and commencing in the 
academic years 2023/2024, 2024/2025, 2025/2026, 2026/2027 and 2027/2028, 
being such number of places as seem reasonably necessary to the Minister for 
Education to meet the purposes set out in section 12(4) of the Employment 
Equality Act 1998 (No. 21 of 1998). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth consents 
to the making of the foregoing order. 

[405] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 August, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 July, 2023. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [405]
